refnamediv.refpurpose: Converts from Julian Day Count to a supported calendar

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
jd
Julian day as integer
calendar
Calendar to convert to

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an array containing calendar information like month, day, year, day of week, abbreviated and full names of weekday and month and the date in string form "month/day/year".

&reftitle.seealso;
cal_to_jd jdtofrench jdtogregorian jdtojewish jdtojulian jdtounix
